skills.name: God Cannon
skills.description: Charged Cannon.1st Sequence: Single shot.2nd Sequence: Empowered double shot.3rd Sequence: Super-powered triple shot.Basic and charged attacks gain 30% Physical DMG to enemies with broken Elite Shield.

skills.name: Rending Shrapnel
skills.description: [SP: 19][CD: 9s] Instantly unleashes a 3-hit charged bombardment sequence. Bombardment bleeds enemies hit to deal 315 Physical DMG every 0.5s for 7s.
